job.title: Data Management - Big Data/Machine Learning Engineer - Sr Big Data/Machine Learning Engineer - Sr
job.description: <strong>Big Data/Machine Learning Engineer - Sr<br><br></strong><strong>Duration: 7+ months<br><br></strong><strong>Location: Plano, TX (After September has to be onsite)<br><br></strong><strong><u>About The Project<br><br></u></strong>It will be a development focused role.<br><br>To make sure that we are sharing the right data that we are supposed to.<br><br>To help us understanding more about the use of that data.<br><br>Currently it is little bit less on machine learning and more on big data side<br><br><strong><u>Day To Day<br><br></u></strong>Primary responsibility are in terms of Control development.<br><br>Enhancing the features<br><br>Helping with the productionizing of what we are doing<br><br>Enhancing our Python and spark detective controls<br><br>AWS: S3, EMR and EC2 use for control purpose.<br><br>Jenkins experience is helpful in terms of productionising<br><br>After that BAU aspect will come where the person will work more on analysing part to find out what is missing and what correction is needed.<br><br>Extraction of data using Restful API and Python (Panda)<br><br>Perform root analysis<br><br>Individual contribution: Good Comm skills are important.<br><br><strong><u>Critical Technical Expertise<br><br></u></strong>BAU: Extracting data using Python (Panda)<br><br>Exposure to Restful API to run some analysis<br><br>Good Analytical expertise<br><br>3-4 years of experience in AWS environment.<br><br>Spark<br><br>SQL<br><br><strong>Nice to Have: </strong>Jenkins, AWS Certification is plus (Solution Architect)
